about_typing-text: I am a recent graduate with a strong drive to create smart, sustainable, and modern solutions.
about_education: I recently graduated from Teknikhögskolan, where I spent two years specializing in backend development, databases, frontend, JavaScript frameworks, and cloud services. During my studies, I discovered how much I enjoy combining logical thinking with creative problem-solving.
about_internship: During my studies, I also completed an internship at Else AB, where I gained hands-on experience in a real development environment, collaborated in a team, and applied my tech in practice.
about_goal: I am curious, goal-oriented, and enjoy taking on new technical challenges. I am now looking for a position where I can continue to grow, contribute with energy, and develop further as a software developer alongside a talented team.
proj1_desc: A modern and responsive portfolio website with multilingual support and dark/light theme.
form_success_text: I will get back to you as soon as possible.
